item.title: Sticker Manager for macOS
item.description: Hi, this is one of my first projects that I’m comfortable with sharing. Similar to stickers on iMessage, this app allows you to create stickers from screenshots or existing images on the fly. It’s pretty self explanatory, but there are 3 main components: a sticker manager, editor, and popover. You can edit and view your sticker collections in the manager, cut-out stickers from screen captures using the editor, and easily insert images into any textfield.
